mapper.select: SELECT m.fUuid AS `uuid`, m.fGroup AS `group`, m.fKeyword AS `keyword`, m.fUpdateTime AS `updateTime`, m.fCreateTime AS `createTime`, m.fComplaintsTime AS `complaintsTime` FROM t_ts_main_keyword AS m WHERE 1 = 1 AND m.fKeyword LIKE '%${tsMainKeyword.keyword}%' AND m.fGroup LIKE '%${tsMainKeyword.group}%' LIMIT ${(pageInfo.currentpage-1)*pageInfo.displaysRecords},${pageInfo.displaysRecords}

SELECT m.fUuid AS `uuid`, m.fGroup AS `group`, m.fKeyword AS `keyword`, m.fUpdateTime AS `updateTime`, m.fCreateTime AS `createTime`, m.fComplaintsTime AS `complaintsTime` FROM t_ts_main_keyword m WHERE m.fKeyword = #{mainKeyword}

SELECT m.fUuid AS `uuid`, m.fGroup AS `group`, m.fKeyword AS `keyword`, m.fUpdateTime AS `updateTime`, m.fCreateTime AS `createTime`, m.fComplaintsTime AS `complaintsTime` FROM t_ts_main_keyword AS m ORDER BY m.fComplaintsTime
